level.text: Any person adversely affected or aggrieved by a final compliance order, cease and desist order or other administrative order issued pursuant to this chapter and ยง 10 of the Act may appeal the action by filing a petition for review in the D.C. Court of Appeals.
The appeal shall be filed in conformity with the rules of the District of Columbia Court of Appeals.
The filing of a petition for review shall not in itself stay enforcement of the final order or decision.

level.heading: SOURCE
level.text: Final Rulemaking published at 40 DCR 7835, 7922 (November 12, 1993); as amended by Final Rulemaking published at 46 DCR 7699 (October 1, 1999).
